name: Advanced Concepts in Movement
description: Advanced movement training to refine the skills and concepts developed thus far in DRM200Y1 and DRM300Y1, focusing on performance. Techniques of personal physical awareness, movement as a tool for discovery in acting processes, movement as communication in performance, ensemble work, and movement generation are studied.
department: Centre for Drama, Theatre and Performance Studies
prerequisites: Minimum CGPA of 2.7; DRM220Y1/DRM230Y1; DRM300Y1 and permission of the Centre
